title: (x) Script "J'adore Teenvogue" on COACD Liveblog - Snell Roundhand {Jan E}
content:
Hi

I´m not sure what typeface was used in this image ...

I´m talking about the “J’adore Teenvogue”-typeface.

thanks so much in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906121100im_/http:/typophile.com/files/coacd_paris_2_6523.jpg)

 [‹ Handango.com square constructed display face](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906121100/http:/typophile.com/node/42673 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) CorrectVision stressed sans logo - Optima {Marc 0} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906121100/http:/typophile.com/node/42677 "Go to next forum topic")
author: candlebougie

comments.content: Seems to be [Snell Roundhand](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906121100/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/snell-roundhand-script/). The J is different, though.

Looks like Akzidenz Grotesk.

EDIT: Duh...! Sorry, I didn’t read your post properly.

They probably modified it because teens can’t read cursive anymore. If you slice the top off the capital ’I’, you can get that sort of ’J’.

- Lex
